output_questions.question: Centered text
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph text is centered horizontally using `text-align: center`.

output_questions.question: heading
output_questions.explanation: All text in the heading is converted to uppercase letters.

output_questions.question: Spaced
output_questions.explanation: Each letter in the heading is separated by 4 pixels.

output_questions.question: Lots of space here
output_questions.explanation: Extra space is added between each word in the paragraph.

output_questions.question: Shadowed text
output_questions.explanation: A gray drop shadow appears behind the heading text.

output_questions.question: Indented paragraph
output_questions.explanation: The first line of the paragraph is indented by 40px.

output_questions.question: Right aligned
output_questions.explanation: The heading is aligned to the right edge of its container.

output_questions.question: capitalize each word
output_questions.explanation: The first letter of each word in the paragraph is capitalized.

output_questions.question: Strikethrough text
output_questions.explanation: A line is drawn through the text in the paragraph.

output_questions.question: Tighten
output_questions.explanation: The letters in the heading are closer together by 2 pixels.

output_questions.question: This paragraph is justified. The lines will be stretched so that each line has equal width.
output_questions.output: This paragraph is justified. The lines will be stretched so that each line has equal width.
output_questions.explanation: Text is aligned on both the left and right sides.

output_questions.question: Overlined heading
output_questions.explanation: A line is drawn above the heading text.

output_questions.question: Glowing text
output_questions.explanation: A red glowing shadow effect is applied to the paragraph text.

output_questions.question: LOWERCASE HEADING
output_questions.explanation: All letters in the heading are converted to lowercase.
